name: Python enhanced metafile (.emf) bindings
short_description: Pure Python library for Enhanced Metafile (.emf) ECMA-234 compliant scalable graphics files. ECMA-234 is the published API for the Windows GDI, and .emf vector graphics files are natively supported by the OpenOffice suite of tools and in RTF files.
